fields.label: Authorization Name
fields.description: A unique name to identify this Etsy authorization.

fields.label: API Key
fields.description: The API Key provided by Etsy for your application.

fields.label: API Secret
fields.description: The API Secret provided by Etsy for your application.

fields.label: Access Token
fields.description: The Access Token generated after authenticating with Etsy.

fields.label: Access Token Secret
fields.description: The secret associated with the access token.

fields.label: Refresh Token
fields.description: The token used to refresh the access token when it expires.

fields.label: Token Expiry
fields.description: The expiry time of the current access token.

fields.label: Etsy Shop ID
fields.description: The unique ID of your Etsy shop.

fields.label: Etsy Shop Name
fields.description: The name of the Etsy shop linked to this authorization.

fields.label: Is Active
fields.description: Indicates whether this authorization is active for synchronization.

fields.label: Last Sync Time
fields.description: The last time orders were synchronized using this authorization.

fields.label: Created By
fields.description: The user who created this authorization record.

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Additional notes or comments about this authorization.
